QuestData.Title: Watching Our Back
QuestData.Description: <Watch Commander Relthorn Netherwane speaks in hushed tones.>$b$bI have orders from... higher up... that you would be suitable for. I've seen the Horde periodically referring to a stack of papers on that barrel over there. I'd like you to take a look at those papers and find out what it is that they're plotting. My duty and station prevent me from such a questionable task, but a newcomer like you might be able to slip in unnoticed...
QuestData.LogDescription: Examine the Horde Plans at the Dark Portal without getting caught.
QuestData.RewardText: You're certain nobody saw you? Good.$b$b<Netherwane listens to your recount of the information you saw.>$b$bHmph... fairly harmless stuff. Either the Horde are foolish enough to NOT be planning something against us... or they're hiding their information better than I expected. Either way, well done, soldier.
